Author: invincibletitan33
Text: Hi there. While this sub is a support community for those with an ED or disordered eating/thoughts, it's not for giving tips or promoting ED behaviour (read the sidebar).  It's easy for disordered behaviour to become compulsive and spiral out of control, but there are plenty of help/recovery resources out there and on the sidebar if you are not sure whether you have an ED/if you think you are in a position of stopping before things escalate.   Stay safe ðŸ’•
